001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.zeromq;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
004import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.ChainTip;
005import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Flowable;
006import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.Disposable;
007import io.reactivex.rxjava3.processors.BehaviorProcessor;
008import io.reactivex.rxjava3.processors.FlowableProcessor;
009import org.bitcoinj.core.Block;
010import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
011import org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction;
012import org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.ChainTipService;
013import org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.jsonrpc.RxBitcoinClient;
014import org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.RxBlockchainService;
015
016import java.io.Closeable;
017import java.net.URI;
018import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
019
020
021/**
022 *  Add conversion to bitcoinj-types to {@code RxBitcoinZmqBinaryService}. Also
023 *  uses the JSON-RPC client to fetch an initial {@link Block} so subscribers don't
024 *  have to wait ~ten minutes for one.
025 */
026public class RxBitcoinZmqService extends RxBitcoinZmqBinaryService implements RxBlockchainService, ChainTipService, Closeable {
027
028    private final FlowableProcessor<ChainTip> flowableChainTip = BehaviorProcessor.create();
029    private final Disposable blockSubscription;
030
031    public RxBitcoinZmqService(Network network, URI rpcUri, String rpcUser, String rpcPassword) {
032        this(new RxBitcoinClient(network, rpcUri, rpcUser, rpcPassword));
033    }
034
035    public RxBitcoinZmqService(RxBitcoinClient client) {
036        super(client);
037        blockSubscription = blockPublisher()
038                .flatMapSingle(client::activeChainTipFromBestBlock)
039                .distinctUntilChanged(ChainTip::getHash)
040                .subscribe(this::onNextChainTip, flowableChainTip::onError, flowableChainTip::onComplete);
041    }
042
043    @Override
044    public Flowable<Transaction> transactionPublisher() {
045        return transactionBinaryPublisher()
046                .map(bytes -> Transaction.read(ByteBuffer.wrap(bytes)));   // Deserialize to Transaction
047    }
048
049    @Override
050    public Flowable<Sha256Hash> transactionHashPublisher() {
051        return transactionHashBinaryPublisher()
052                .map(Sha256Hash::wrap);            // Deserialize to Sha256Hash
053    }
054
055    @Override
056    public Flowable<Block> blockPublisher() {
057        return blockBinaryPublisher()
058                .map(ByteBuffer::wrap)
059                .map(Block::read)  // Deserialize to bitcoinj Block
060                .startWith(client.getBestBlockViaRpc()); // Use JSON-RPC client to fetch an initial block
061    }
062    
063    @Override
064    public Flowable<Sha256Hash> blockHashPublisher() {
065        return blockHashBinaryPublisher()
066                .map(Sha256Hash::wrap);             // Deserialize to Sha256Hash
067    }
068
069    @Override
070    public Flowable<Integer> blockHeightPublisher() {
071        return chainTipPublisher()
072                .map(ChainTip::getHeight);          // Extract block height
073    }
074
075    @Override
076    public Flowable<ChainTip> chainTipPublisher() {
077        return flowableChainTip;
078    }
079
080    @Override
081    public void close()  {
082        super.close();
083        blockSubscription.dispose();
084    }
085
086    // For setting breakpoints
087    void onNextChainTip(ChainTip tip) {
088        flowableChainTip.onNext(tip);
089    }
090}
